# 경영과 정보기술

## 1주차

**✔️ 경영 용어 이해하기**

Business : 사업

Business Administration or Business Administration Management : 경영

Business economics : 경영학

**✔️ 경영에서 6하원칙 이해하기**

```
Who : 소비자 심리 / 행동 (cosumer psychology / behavior), 마케팅(marketing), 리더십(leadership), 조직행동(organizational behavior)

** Where : 산업(industry) **

Why + How : 사명(Mission) / 비전(Vision), 전략(Strategy), 혁신(Innovation)

** What + When : Value Chain **
```

## 2주차

**✔️ 경영학의 배경, 역사**

1886년 : TheManagement begain in **1886** in Chicago with Henry R.Towne's speech **"The Engineer as an Economist"**

Three eras

1880s - 1950s : Scientific Management(Henry R.Towne, Henry Fayol, Frederick Winslow Taylor, Elton Mayo)

1950s - 1980s : Triumphant (성공적인, Peter F. Drucker, Douglas McGregor, BCG, M&A)

1980s - 2010s : Globalism(Michael Porter, Clayton Christensen, Thomas Davenport)

**✔️ Scientific Management**

Henry R. Towne : management, a set of practice rooted in economics, achieving maximum efficiency with the resources provided

1886년 5월 : "The Engineer as an Economist"

- "There were good engineers and good businessmen, but seldom were they one and the same."

- Good engineers, Good buinessmen

Henry Fayol : Fayol의 관리 기능 (Planning, Orgainzing, Commanding, Coordinating, Controlling)

Frederick Winslow Taylor : Engineering  -> Business operations (Taylor의 과학적 관리법 : 작업 분석, 작업 설계, 작업자 선택 및 교육, 성과 평가 및 보상, 작업 간섭 최소화)

**✔️ Triumphant**

Peter F. Drucker : "business thinker"

Douglas McGregor : Theory X, Theory Y

BCG : "Corporate strategy", BCG Matrix
```
1. 성장률, 시장점유율 높으면 Star

2. 성장률이 낮으나, 시장점유율이 높으면 Cash Flow

3. 성장률이 높으나, 시장점유율이 낮으면 Question Mark

4. 성장률, 시장점유율 낮으면 Dog
```

**✔️ Globalism**

Michael Porter : "Business process reengineering(BPR), Core Competence,
Balanced Score Card (BSC)


Clayton Christensen : disruptive innovation

Thomas Davenport : Anaytics, Big Data, AI

**✔️ 경영에서의 way**

There will never be "the one best way"

There's almost always a **better way** Management will keep looking for it.


**✔️ Quiz**

```
1. '비즈니스와 IT의 융합인재'가 되기 위한 바람직한 방법은 -> 비즈니스와 IT의 핵심을 빠르게 파악하여 나(회사)의 필요를 파악한다.

2. "거인의 어깨에 올라라(Stand on the shoulders of giants)"에서 거인이 의미하는 것은? -> 선배 학자들 혹은 어떤 분야의 대가(master)

3. "물고기 vs 물고기 잡는 법"에서 수업에서 말한 물고기 잡는 법은? -> "분석(anaylsis)와 종합(synthesis)"로 전체를 보고 중요한 것 파악하기

4. 경영이 영어로 무엇인지? -> Business Administration, Management

5. 경영을 6하원칙으로 나눠봤을 때, where에 해당하는 것은? -> 산업 (industry)
```

## 3주차

**✔️ Operational Effectiveness is not strategy**

1. Operational Effectiveness : Best practice, similar activities better
- necessary, not sufficient

2. Strategy : Positioning, different activities 

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/81727895/242945536-091f18e8-e997-4b26-a36c-47123ddae464.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..o3-gJcIt4GTbeIzf6laCn6q6q4epEnvDfsn87hLh08Q">


**✔️ Strategy rests Unique Activities**

- The origins of strategic positions

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/81727895/242945959-9c8fd2c5-0199-420a-94eb-7177c328e95b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..WhxN1JVtdPhYpXh9FVJeDCplcfAq3HSl31lNjNRbUY8">


```
Needs-based positioning :  특정 고객, 다양한 제품 (ex : 시티뱅크 , PB)

Variety-based positioning : 다양한 고객, 특정 제품 (ex : 윤활유, 펀드)
```

**flow  vs stock**

flow : activity, positioning

stock : competitive advantage, differentiation

🤔 Strategy is the creation of a **unique** and valueable **postion**, involving a **different** set of **activities**

**✔️ A sustainable strategic position requires trade-offs**

Trade-offs means that **more** of one thing necessitates **less of another**.

=> The essence of startegy is choosing what **not** to do

**✔️ Fit drives both competitive advantage and sustainability**

Strategy is **creating fit** among a company's activities.

**✔️ the failure to choose the grouwth trap Profitable growth the role of leadership**

- **Deepening a strategic position** : 

- **The role of leadership** 

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/81727895/242947661-34b2c7f1-f487-4191-a767-3a448376fa51.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rg8m71PGd_db84Mb0bMhbitZJnzDobcft7NsymKR9uA">

## 4주차

**✔️ Competitive Strategy - Techniques for analyzing industries and competitors**

1. the five forces

```
    N
S - C - B
    S

C : Rivalry Among Existing Competitors
B : Bargaining Power of Buyers
S : Threat of Substitude Products or Services
S : Bargaining Power of Suppliers
N : Threat of New Entrants
```

- 영어 버전

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/81727895/242948870-e7bd4c85-f120-4186-b77a-a15ed9d365a2.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5otLpoNWGZ_2JJyUFfUcaLk-zlfhCd2rvykyXv_Y0xE">

```
Competitors : 경쟁자
Suppliers : 공급자
Buyers : 구매자
Substitutes : 대체재
New Entrants : 새로운 진입자
```

- 한국어 버전

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/81727895/242948724-d50e9a5c-af0a-4963-9605-8ad8c7ebe443.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..brH_jD7a-9uRncoi6uHE18PmIAbuLClujgKZBzHDU0s">
